message:
Ever heard of QML? It is a declarative UI language or a Qt Modeling Language.
سيبك من الكلام الكبير و شوف الفيديو ده لمبرمج بيعمل برنامج كامل فى 15د يعمل بحث على فليكر و يعرض الصور. هتتفاجأ بسهولة البرمجة باللغة ديه
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_6_F6Kpjd-Q
name: Introducing Qt Quick Controls in Qt 5.1
description: Jens Bache-Wiig demonstrates how to use Qt Quick Controls with Qt 5.1

data.message:
1- There is no such thing as "without writing a single line of code". QML itself is code.

2- Creating desktop UI was harder than it needs to be. Windows Forms & Qt Quick are making this better.
Mohammad Tayseer I think Alaa New meant without adding extra lines of codes for porting the application to other platforms. QML is code we all agree to that
